title: Schedule Professional Photography for a New Listing
description: A new listing needs professional photos taken before it goes live. The agent's assistant must schedule the shoot.

tasks.description: Contact the brokerage's preferred real estate photographer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Assistant finds the contact info for 'Picture Perfect Homes'.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the seller to find a suitable date and time for the photo shoot.
tasks.expected_outcome: A time that works for both the seller and photographer is agreed upon.

tasks.description: Send a 'Preparing for Photos' checklist to the seller to help them get the house ready.
tasks.expected_outcome: A helpful checklist is emailed to the seller.
